website_summaries.verdict: Made for Apple's iMac but suitable for all PCs, this is more than just a computer monitor stand. The Satechi Type-C Aluminum Monitor Stand Hub is, as the name suggests, also a USB hub that makes life that little bit easier with a row of ports within easy reach.
pros: Works as USB-A and USB-C hub

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good design, space underneath for other kit.
customer_reviews.text: A solid, colour-matched silver stand to compliment iMac, a nice addition which looks the part and has space for other kit, such as external hard drives underneath. Functionality as you'd expect, which makes using the mac so much easier if you're adding USBs or memory cards. I've placed a couple of WD Passport Drives side by side. I'm impressed with the overall look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Best Dog Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nicely manufactured and ergonomically sound.
customer_reviews.text: I evaluated several of these stands with built in USB hubs before deckling on this one and I am glad I did. I have it sat on a separate glass strengthened stand that as adjustable height ( I purchased this at the same time -  This gives me a stylish minimalist look and functional mounting combination for my iMac 27" desktop computer with easy from access to USB plug in devices and an adjustable height for comfortable working. An added benefit is that there is space on to store peripherals such as the mouse and also room to slide the keyboard under the glass stand on which this SATECHI plinth sits.
customer_reviews.author: Amateur Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design but failed...
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely designed, and looked well-made. It started off very well and useful, but inexplicably stopped working after just over one month of use, despite my checking all connections several times. A pity, as it appears to suit the iMac very well. Had to return it as defective.
customer_reviews.author: datym

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a stand for my 27" iMac to lift it higher (slightly) plus I wanted a Sd card reader and other ports on the front of the iMac, this Satechi stand filled the requirements in every way. A great product and it looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for an iMac!
customer_reviews.text: It really is ideal for raising the iMac, and with the addition of the card reader and USB sockets is great, also being aluminium it match’s the iMac perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Atfield

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I could’ve bought a cheaper product but this appeared to offer exactly what I wanted. Glad I picked this product. Beautifully packaged, looks great, sturdy, and works. Love the SD card slots - really useful for me. Can’t fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Looks the part
customer_reviews.text: This sits nicely under my iMac 27” and looks made for it. Good quality stand with enough strength to cope with the weight of the iMac. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Box of Frogs

customer_reviews.title: Really Great stylish product
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product, strong sturdy, stylish design and excellent front access to ports. PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: R.I.M.BERRY

customer_reviews.title: It does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and performs as described. A great pity that Apple fails to have a height adjustment on their very expensive computers. That said, the forward facing sockets on this stand are a great addition, and perform seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Cerdic

customer_reviews.title: easy access to USB ports etc
customer_reviews.text: Monitor stand arrived very quickly. Instructions not really necessary. Gives an excellent eye to screen height. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: cogito

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and a simple way to bring ports to the front of an iMac. Use the included USB C to USB A converter and you won’t wast a precious thunderbolt port.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes USB ports accessible
customer_reviews.text: As well as raising the iMac to a better working height, it makes 3 USB ports, a headphone output, an SD card reader which is significantly more convenient than where they are on the iMac. Well made, well designed, solid and looks match with Apple design.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and sleek design. Arrived within a few days. Can’t complain. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Debapratim Sarkar

customer_reviews.title: It’s as the label says
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at a lot of stand for my 2019 Mac 27 and after reading reviews after reviews I came to this yes it’s costly agains most but boy it’s great !! It looks like part of the Mac and saves me fiddling around the back of my Mac as everything is just in front of you. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: David Murray GRUMPY GRAMPS 😇🦍

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality but
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality but my only issue is very little power comes out of this... This will not run an external DVD drive but can charge and iphone/ipad slowly...A little on the pricey side but workmanship is top notch
customer_reviews.author: Lee T

customer_reviews.title: Just check the height it lifts the screen up is satisfactory.
customer_reviews.text: All the connections on the front make it very useful and easy to use. Finish is excellent . I keep the backup/extra storage drives underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Osborn

customer_reviews.title: No good if your desk is against a wall.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have clear walk around access to the back of your desk, the USB points are useless.
customer_reviews.author: MR R J AHMAD

customer_reviews.title: Useful for iMac
customer_reviews.text: Could do with more USB C ports on the front panel
customer_reviews.author: W G ALLEYN

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Really well made stand but be aware it will not charge or even let you connect an iPad Pro through the usb c port
customer_reviews.author: mark

product_meta.title: Satechi Type-C Aluminum Monitor Stand Hub with USB-C Data, USB 3.0, Micro/SD Card Slots & 3.5mm Headphone Jack - Compatible with 2020-2015 iMac, iMac Pro and more
feature_bullets: ELEVATE YOUR IMAC - lifts your iMac monitor to a comfortable viewing angle to help reduce neck strain and encourage better posture

BUILT-IN EXPANSION PORTS - adds USB-C data transfer (up to 5 Gbps), 3 USB 3.0 ports (up to 5 Gbps), micro/SD card slots (up to 104 Mbps) and audio jack port for built-in access to all your frequently used ports
MAXIMIZE YOUR SPACE - creates valuable desk storage to organize your keypads, notebooks, chargers and more! Max width: 8.5 inches
ELEGANT & FUNCTIONAL - its sleek yet durable design seamlessly blends into your modern desk setup, for desktops and monitors up to 50 lbs.
COMPATIBILITY - Compatible with 2020-2015 iMac, iMac Pro and more. Supports all Apple iMac models with our included Type-A to Type-C adapter.

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
